page.title: 18RECREATION IN CRAIGS FAMILY
page.content: My mum and dad sometimes take our dog out for a walk on a Sunday. And other times they go out somewhere in our van in their spare time. I go to my friends or to the swimming baths or I watch television, when I am bored. My nana and grandad go out to bingo on a Tuesday, Wednesday and Saturday. My other nana and grandad do their garden on a Wednesday and a Sunday. They get a lot of enjoyment ou of that. My uncle sometimes makes things out of wood and he makes some very nice things and he enjoys his work and my other relatives do all sorts of things.
